select*from (select*from (select catenum, catename, mcatenum, mcatename, productnum, productname, userid, productprice, saleselect, optionselect, saleb, sellstart, sellfinish, thumbimg, saleprice, to_number(productprice - saleprice) sellprice, floor((saleprice/productprice)*100) as salepercent, salestart, salefinish, NVL( sum(orderquantity) , 0) as soldstock, to_number(totalstock- NVL( sum(orderquantity) , 0)) as nowstock ,totalstock from (select c.catenum,c.catename,m.mcatenum, m.mcatename, o.orderquantity, p.productnum, p.productname, p.userid, p.totalstock, p.productprice, p.saleselect, p.optionselect, p.saleb, p.thumbimg, to_char(p.sellstart,'YY/MM/DD') as sellstart, to_char(p.sellfinish,'YY/MM/DD') as sellfinish , d.saleprice, to_char(d.salestart, 'YY/MM/DD') as salestart, to_char(d.salefinish, 'YY/MM/DD') as salefinish from product p left join orderdetail o on p.productnum = o.productnum join mcategory m on p.mcatenum = m.mcatenum join category c on c.catenum = m.catenum left join discount d on p.productnum = d.productnum
where p.userid='${userid}' and ( p.productnum like '%${searchWord}%' or c.catenum like '%${searchWord}%' or c.catename like '%${searchWord}%' or m.catenum like '%${searchWord}%' or m.mcatename like '%${searchWord}%' or p.productname like '%${searchWord}%' or p.productprice like '%${searchWord}%' or d.saleprice like '%${searchWord}%' or sellstart like '%${searchWord}%' or sellstart like '%${searchWord}%' )
where p.userid='${userid}'
group by c.catenum,c.catename, m.mcatenum, m.mcatename, p.totalstock,p.productnum, p.productname, p.userid, o.ordernum, o.orderquantity, p.productprice, p.saleselect, p.optionselect, p.saleb, p.sellstart, p.sellfinish, p.thumbimg, d.saleprice, d.salestart, d.salefinish) group by catenum, catename, mcatenum, mcatename, productnum, userid, productname, totalstock, productprice, saleselect, optionselect, saleb, sellstart, sellfinish, thumbimg, saleprice, salestart, salefinish order by productnum desc) where rownum<=(${pageNum}*${onePageRecord}) order by productnum) where rownum<= ${lastPageRecord} ${onePageRecord} order by productnum desc

select productnum, NVL( sum(orderquantity) , 0) as soldstock, to_number(totalstock- NVL( sum(orderquantity) , 0)) as nowstock ,totalstock from (select p.totalstock, p.productnum, o.orderquantity from orderdetail o right join product p on p.productnum = o.productnum where p.userid = '${userid}' group by p.totalstock,p.productnum, o.ordernum, o.orderquantity) group by productnum, totalstock
select count(productnum) totalRecord from product where userid='${userid}'
mapper.insert: insert into product (productnum, userid, mcatenum, productname, productprice, saleselect, saleb, optionselect, sellstart, sellfinish, totalstock, nowstock, thumbimg, productcontent, deliveryoption, deliveryprice, paymentoption, selloption, sellweight,origin, wrapping, productinfomation, prevention, deadline) values(productsq.nextval, '${userid}' , ${mcatenum}, '${productname}', ${productprice}, '${saleselect}', '${saleb}', '${optionselect}', '${sellstart}','${sellfinish}', ${totalstock}, ${totalstock},'${thumbimg}', '${productcontent}', '${deliveryoption}', ${deliveryprice}, '${paymentoption}', '${selloption}', '${sellweight}', '${origin}', '${wrapping}', '${productinfomation}', '${prevention}', '${deadline}')
insert into discount (productnum, saleprice, salestart, salefinish) values(productsq.currval, ${saleprice}, '${salestart}', '${salefinish}')

insert into optiontbl (optionnum, productnum, optionname, optionstock, optionnowstock, optionprice) values (optionsq.nextval, productsq.currval, '${optioname}' ,${optionstock}, ${optionstock}, ${optionprice} )
